oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Blue & Gray Reunion, 1890. Knoxville Journal Special Edition.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Knoxville Journal
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Knoxville Journal Special Souvenir Edition, October 7, 1890. Commemorating the Blue and Gray Reunion of Civil War veterans in Knoxville, Tennessee, in October 1890. Because of the oversized original pages and small typeface, it is recommended that the researcher use the magnification feature when viewing each page on the Digital Collection online.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Reunions; Civil wars; Veterans; Newspapers;
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Knoxville Journal / South Publishing Co., 76 Park Place, N.Y.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Knoxville Journal Special Edition, 1890. Newspaper Box T-28a.
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
